Package dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.log

Class Summary
APINLS This class is used as base class for NLS returned by usage of the tresos Public API.
APIOperationStatus This class is used as base class for OperationStati returned by usage of the tresos Public API.
Log The Log class provides static methods to log messages to the Error Log and to control logging of usage errors for public API methods.
 

Exception Summary
APIException All Exceptions thrown by the Public API inherit from this this Exception.
APIInvalidOperationException This class is used to throw an APIInvalidOperationStatus as exception.
